testdata can be download from:
https://data.csiro.au/collection/csiro:5846
first date of MODIS and Landsat data is date 2001_329_25nov
second date of MODIS data is date 2002_012_12jan

CIA 
source:
Irina V. Emelyanova, Tim R. McVicar, Thomas G. Van Niel, Ling Tao Li, Albert I.J.M. van Dijk,
Assessing the accuracy of blending Landsatâ€“MODIS surface reflectances in two landscapes with contrasting spatial and temporal dynamics: A framework for algorithm selection,
Remote Sensing of Environment,
Volume 133,
2013,
Pages 193-209,
ISSN 0034-4257,
https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2013.02.007.
(https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0034425713000473)
